Class RegexUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.gwt.core.server.RegexUtil

  • public final class RegexUtil
extends java.lang.Object

      • getRegexGroupFromList

                               RegexGroup regexGroup)
        Checks if RegexGroup is present in list provided.
        Parameters:
        regexGroupList - in which presence of specific regex group is searched.
        regexGroup - RegexGroup is to be searched in list on the basis of its name.
        Returns:
        RegexGroup which is found in list provided, if not present then returns null.
